channel.title: How do I start my own server?
channel.description:
I need help starting my own server. I have no idea how and im tired of waiting for all the other servers to come back online. Please reply with instructions and anything i need to download if necessary.
thanks! :)

item.title: How do I start my own server?
item.dc:creator: @m_jon_h m jon h
item.description:
@m_jon_h wrote:

well first go to rs2 server downloads and download a decent source like testscape or pimpscape and then edit it but dont ask me about edititing lol because im no good at server making
